text: "Lay Your Hands on Me" is a 1989 song by American hard rock band Bon Jovi and is the fourth single from their fourth studio album New Jersey (1988). It went to number 7 in the United States, number 8 in New Zealand, number 16 in Switzerland, number 18 in the United Kingdom, number 23 in Australia and number 47 in the Netherlands. Category:1989 songs Category:Bon Jovi songs Category:Dolly Parton songs
title: Lay Your Hands on Me
